answers.answer: Mismanaged diabetes is one of many causes for fatigue and lack of energy. This needs further hands-on evaluation by a medical professional. Without an examination it is difficult confirming, so please get a full health check-up from your doctor.

question: why i feel fatigued and some times i dont want do nothing.my glucose is less than 120mg even after two hour later after diner testing.
title: type2 dibetes
